name: Beat Bot (snwhd, mintwatercolor, Sul_iac)
description:
Jump and fight with Beatbot to the music!  Achieve the highest score you can by following the rhythm: jumping on the platform underneath, grabbing batteries, and blasting enemies in your path.

Tip: The platform underneath turning green is a hint on when to jump, and enemies die in one-shot when aligned with Beatbot's target.

Controls:
Space - Attack
W or Up Arrow -Jump
P - Pause

Credits:
snwhd - Programmer
Mint - Artist (carrd.co)
Suliac - Musician (soundcloud)
